敘造 港元定期存款 4大貼士
近年銀行推出的港元定期存款玩法較多，要穩賺利息，必須在敘造定存前清楚玩法：
1. 毋須一次過存入資金
要敘造定期存款未必需要一筆過，可以分批存入資金以達到最低存款額要求。恒生銀行職員指，只要在開立定存戶口時的存款期內達最低存款額要求便可，新資金可選擇分批存入或一次過存入。
而何謂新資金呢？「合資格新資金結餘」是指最新存款總結餘，與30曆日前之同一貨幣結餘對比所增加的金額，並扣減30曆日內，已享用新資金優惠的定期存款本金總額。舉例說，存戶的理財戶口內，30日前的結餘是30,000元，現時結餘是17萬元，即30日內增長14萬元（$170,000-$30,000）。假設期間享用過新資金定期存款優惠20,000元，即「合資格新資金結餘」是12萬元（$140,000-$20,000），而這筆12萬元可享優惠年利率。
2. 搬現鈔要注意手續費
不少存戶會以「螞蟻搬家」的方式，將資金搬到銀行戶口敘造定期存款。惟要留意的是，若以現鈔存入，不少銀行須收取大量現鈔存款的手續費。例如部分銀行每人每日存入200張現鈔以上，又或存入等值10萬港元，便須收取總存款金額的0.25%手續費。
以前者為例，若敘造20萬元定存，存入200張1,000元鈔票，便毋須收取手續費。以同額計算，倘若存入的全是500元鈔票，則須存入400張，銀行或會收取手續費，故存入現鈔前亦要計算好鈔票張數。又例如有意敘造25萬港元的定存，而在櫃位存入現鈔，則須收取達625元（$250,000 x 0.25%）手續費，或會較所賺取的利息高。故若要敘造大額定期存款，建議可以開支票方式，將A銀行的資金搬到B銀行開賬戶，便可豁免手續費。
3. 開戶口要綑綁其他條件
為吸納客戶使用更多銀行服務，部分銀行的優惠定期存款僅限指定客戶、新客戶或新資金，又可能在開立定存賬戶時同時申請其他服務。例如花旗3個月定期存款年利率2.3%的優惠，僅適用於全新花旗私人客戶業務及Citigold戶口客戶、以全新資金開戶，並須持有包括基金、債券、證券、結構性產品或外幣存款等產品。
4. 到期前提取零收息
要留意的是，定期存款會鎖死資金一段時間。在定存期間，如存戶提早取走資金，銀行會收取最低收費200元，並且不會發放利息。故在敘造定存時要三思。

Narration of Hong Kong dollar time deposits 4 tips
In recent years, the Hong Kong dollar time deposits introduced by banks have played more games. To earn interest earned, it is necessary to clearly understand the game before the deposit:
1. No need to deposit funds in one go
To make a time deposit, it may not be necessary to make a one-off deposit. You can deposit funds in batches to meet the minimum deposit requirement. Hang Seng Bank staff said that as long as the minimum deposit amount is required during the deposit period when opening a deposit account, the new funds can be deposited in batches or in one lump sum.
And what is new funding? “Eligible New Fund Balance” refers to the amount of the latest deposit balance, which is increased compared with the same currency balance before 30 calendar days, and deducted the total amount of time deposit principals that have enjoyed the new fund discount within 30 calendar days. For example, in the deposit account of the depositor, the balance before 30 days is 30,000 yuan, and the current balance is 170,000 yuan, that is, an increase of 140,000 yuan ($170,000-$30,000) within 30 days. Assume that during the period, you have enjoyed a new fund time deposit of 20,000 yuan, that is, the "eligible new fund balance" is 120,000 yuan ($140,000-$20,000), and this 120,000 yuan can enjoy the preferential annual interest rate.
2. Pay attention to the handling fee when moving the banknote
Many depositors will transfer funds to bank accounts to create time deposits in the form of "ant moving." The only thing to note is that if deposits are made in cash, many banks are required to charge a large amount of cash deposit fees. For example, if some banks deposit more than 200 banknotes per day, or deposit an equivalent of HK$100,000, they will be charged a 0.25% commission on the total deposit amount.
For the former, for example, if a $200,000 deposit is made and 200 1,000-dollar bills are deposited, no handling fee will be charged. In the same amount, if all the deposits are 500 yuan, 400 copies must be deposited. The bank may charge a handling fee. Therefore, the number of banknotes must be calculated before depositing the cash. For example, if you want to save a deposit of HK$250,000, you will be charged a fee of 625 yuan ($250,000 x 0.25%) if you deposit cash in the counter, which may be higher than the interest earned. Therefore, if you want to reproduce a large-rated deposit, it is recommended that you can open a check to transfer the funds of Bank A to Bank B to open an account, and you can waive the fee.
3. Open an account to bundle other conditions
In order to absorb more banking services for customers, some banks' preferential time deposits are limited to designated customers, new customers or new funds, and may also apply for other services when opening a deposit account. For example, Citi's 3-month time deposit with a 2.3% annual interest rate is only applicable to the new Citi private client business and Citigold account customers, opening a new fund, and holding funds, bonds, securities, structured products or foreign currency deposits. product.
4. Extract zero income before expiration
It should be noted that time deposits will lock up funds for a while. During the deposit period, if the depositor withdraws the funds early, the bank will charge a minimum fee of 200 yuan and will not issue interest. Therefore, think twice when making a reservation.
